title: Louise Haigh – 2022 Comments on Rail Fare Increase
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on Twitter on 22 December 2022.
content:
The Tories have just announced a brutal near-record 6% rail fare rise.
